snippet: “A New York Fourth,” the first part of the New York Philharmonic’s Summertime Classics series, paid tribute to Bernstein, Gershwin and a variety of patriotic tunes.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by the New York Philharmonic at Avery Fisher Hall as part of its Summertime Classics series.
lead_paragraph: “A New York Fourth,” the first part of the New York Philharmonic’s Summertime Classics series, paid tribute to Bernstein, Gershwin and a variety of patriotic tunes.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic’s ‘New York Fourth,’ at Avery Fisher
headline.main: For Summer, Show Tunes and Marches
headline.print_headline: For Summer, Show Tunes and Marches
